T02D1914:196b-21: go zhes te de yang gsungs pa /
T02D1914:196b-22: dpal dang shes rab dang sbyor ba //
T02D1914:196b-24: nor bu'i dkyil du gnas par brtag / ces pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1914:196b-25: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba la gsang ba'i dbang gsungs pa /
T02D1914:196b-26: khu ba'am zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:196b-27: bshad pa yang cho ga bzhin du byas te /
T02D1914:196b-28: de dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyi khu ba dang bza' zhes te /
T02D1914:196b-29: rdo rje blo zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad du sbyor ba'i slob ma'o //
T02D1914:196b-31: de nas gzugs la sogs ldan ma //
T02D1914:196b-33: sna tshogs bzhin te sna tshogs 'gyur //
T02D1914:196b-35: rnam pa 'di bzhi zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang gi sdom pa ste /
T02D1914:196b-36: srung ba'i dam tshig bzhi yin no //
T02D1914:196b-37: sngags kyi 'khor lo ni sngags kyis bskyed pa'i 'khor lo 'am /
T02D1914:196b-38: sa bon gsum gyi sngags las spros pa'i rdo rje
T02D1914:196b-39: gsum gyi gzugs brnyan gyi 'khor lo ste kun la
T02D1914:196b-40: shes par bya'o // sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa //
T02D1914:196b-41: zhes pa ni 'khor lo gsum gyi don spyad pa srung ba'i dam tshig go zhes pa'i don to ;
T02D1914:196b-42: / zas 'bar bar byas la nye ba'i slob dpon
T02D1914:196b-43: gyis slob ma spro ba bskyed pa'i don du mthu
T02D1914:196b-44: bstan pa dang / zas kyis bsnyen pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:196b-45: glang po'i sha dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:196b-46: de la aom la sogs pas zas 'bar bar byas te slob ma la brten nas bza' zhe'o //
T02D1914:197a-2: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa dang //
T02D1914:197a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:197a-4: dkyil 'khor dag gi zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1914:197a-5: 'di ni rjes su gnang ba'i don du shes par bya ste de yang gsungs pa ;
T02D1914:197a-8: gong ma'i zas kyi 'phro gsungs pa /
T02D1914:197a-9: bshang gci zhes te kham phor ni bhandha'o //
T02D1914:197a-10: spyan ma zhes pa ni me dang rlung ngo //
T02D1914:197a-11: lhan cig 'khor zhes pa ni lhan cig bza' zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1914:197a-12: da ni thun mong gi sgrub pa dag las phyag
T02D1914:197a-13: brnyan sgrub pa gsungs pa de la 'di ni zhes
T02D1914:197a-15: 'di'i don ni gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1914:197a-16: mdun gyi nam mkha'i dbus la rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1914:197a-17: las gyur pa'i yi ge dh'i 'bar ba bsams te
T02D1914:197a-18: / de la sangs rgyas kyi tshogs 'od kyis phab
T02D1914:197a-19: nas de las gyur pa'i aa la sogs pa dang
T02D1914:197a-20: / / rang gi mtshan ma de la gshin rje
T02D1914:197a-21: gshed la sogs pa'i phyag brnyan gsum gyi gzugs don
T02D1914:197a-22: yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa bskyed nas bskul ba
T02D1914:197a-23: / / ste / sku la sogs pa ni de'i rigs kyi khro bo rnams so //
T02D1914:197a-24: de dag gi ye shes sems dpa' la yang aa
T02D1914:197a-25: la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs nas gsang ba'i gnas
T02D1914:197a-26: su gzhag par bya ste bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1914:197a-27: phyag na rdo rje zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1914:197a-28: gsang ba'i gnas ni gang la gnas nas de dag bskul ba ste /
T02D1914:197a-29: nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i mi bskyod
T02D1914:197a-30: pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor bas
T02D1914:197a-32: de nas rdo rje gsum gyi sa bon h'um la
T02D1914:197a-33: sogs pa'i 'od thun mong gi dam tshig bzhi'i sdug
T02D1914:197a-34: bsngal ba dang / aa la sogs pa las 'phros
T02D1914:197a-35: pa khro bo bdud rtsi che ba la sogs pa
T02D1914:197a-36: dag gis 'og nas 'byung ba'i thun mong gi dam
T02D1914:197a-37: tshig gi tshogs rang gi lha drag tu bskul te
T02D1914:197a-38: bsngal ba dang / / de dag gi ye shes
T02D1914:197a-39: sems dpar bcings nas rnal 'byor pa rang gi yi
T02D1914:197a-40: ge dang aa la sogs pa bskul ba dang bcas
T02D1914:197a-41: pas ji skad gsungs pa sangs rgyas zhing du khrid
T02D1914:197a-43: sangs rgyas thob pa zhes pa ni sa bon shin tu gzhag par shes par bya'o //
T02D1914:197b-0: de dag gi @197b sgrub pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:197b-1: de la 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1914:197b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas brgyan no zhes
T02D1914:197b-3: pa'i don to // yang de'i yon tan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:197b-4: nam mkha'i dbyings chen dag pa ni //
T02D1914:197b-5: zhes te nam mkha' la dha la sogs pa rmad du byung ba'i gzugs byed do zhe'o //
T02D1914:197b-6: thun mong du gsungs pa de dag las rnal 'byor
T02D1914:197b-7: pas ni phyag brnyan gcig bskul bar shes par bya'o
T02D1914:197b-8: // bsam gtan la brten pa'i dbang gsungs pa /
T02D1914:197b-9: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang rung //
T02D1914:197b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:197b-11: 'di'i don ni rdo rje 'jam pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1914:197b-12: dbu rgyan dmar ba'i rtse mor mda' dmar po lnga
T02D1914:197b-13: lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis btsugs te /
T02D1914:197b-14: cho ga bzhin du de'i ling+ga yi ge dang pos
T02D1914:197b-15: bskyed pa la dgug pa la sogs pa sngon du
T02D1914:197b-16: byas nas de'i spyi bo la sogs par mda' de
T02D1914:197b-18: sngags kyis bskul nas btsugs pas brgyal bar bsgoms na dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa yin no //
T02D1914:197b-19: byis pa'i blo ni grangs chen gyis //
T02D1914:197b-20: zhes pa ni mtshan ma thob pa'i don to //
T02D1914:197b-21: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa
T02D1914:197b-22: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1914:197b-23: / 'di ni ji skad gsungs pa'i rnam par snang
T02D1914:197b-24: mdzad lta bu'i slob ma'i gnas gsum du rdo rje
T02D1914:197b-25: la sogs pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa la h'um
T02D1914:197b-27: mig tu yang aom bkod nas mtshan ma'i gzugs rdo
T02D1914:197b-28: rje la sogs pa de bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bar
T02D1914:197b-29: du dkar po la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i
T02D1914:197b-30: sku thabs dang shes rab tu bstan to zhes pa
T02D1914:197b-31: yin no ; / de yang gsungs pa /
T02D1914:197b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis deng //
T02D1914:197b-35: rnal 'byor pa'i bkres skom gzhom pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:197b-36: bkres skom zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di skad
T02D1914:197b-37: du rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas lce la aom bsams
T02D1914:197b-38: nas de'i steng du bi bum pa lta bu rin
T02D1914:197b-39: po ches brgyan pa bza' bas bkang ba khas phub
T02D1914:197b-40: ste de las byung ba'i bza' btung gis lha rnams
T02D1914:197b-41: tshim par bya'o zhes ston to //
T02D1914:197b-42: da ni thun mong gi sgrub pa dag las sngags
T02D1914:197b-43: kyi las can rnams kyi sgrub pa dag las dpa'
T02D1914:197b-44: bo rdo rje sgrub pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:198a-2: de ni gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas rdo
T02D1914:198a-3: rje sems dpa' rkyen du byas pa bi ser po
T02D1914:198a-4: dang rdo rje ser po las gyur pa'i dpa' bo
T02D1914:198a-5: rdo rje ser po phyag na bsnams pa /
T02D1914:198a-6: rig mas 'khyud pa mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa
T02D1914:198a-7: cung zad 'gying ba ji lta ba bzhin du phyung
T02D1914:198a-8: nas bdag gi yi ge dang bskul ba'i yi ges
T02D1914:198a-9: gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad bskul bas nyan par
T02D1914:198a-10: bsams nas 'grub ces ji snyed pa'o //
T02D1914:198a-11: skul byed ma'i gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:198a-12: snga ma bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' rkyen du byas
T02D1914:198a-13: pa'i tsum dang padma dkar po las tsunde ma mdog
T02D1914:198a-14: dkar po thabs la 'khyud pa padma dkar po 'chang
T02D1914:198a-15: ba mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa bsams te /
T02D1914:198a-16: aom na ma:sa manta samyaksam buddha ko ti nam zhes
T02D1914:198a-17: pa la sogs pa las kyi dbye bas sngags kyi
T02D1914:198a-19: yang dzambha la la gsungs pa /
T02D1914:198a-20: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:198a-21: de yang snga ma bzhin dzam dang bi dza p'u
T02D1914:198a-22: ra ne'u le'i rgyal pa ser po las gyur pa
T02D1914:198a-23: gnod sbyin ma bzhis bskor ba'am /
T02D1914:198a-24: 'di las gcig pu rig ma la 'khyud pa phyag
T02D1914:198a-25: rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa snying ga la sogs pa'i
T02D1914:198a-26: gnas lnga la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lngas
T02D1914:198a-27: brgyan pa rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pas dbu
T02D1914:198a-29: phyag rgya bzhi ni gong du yang sbyar ro //
T02D1914:198a-30: rdo rje bdud rtsi chu dag ni //
T02D1914:198a-31: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i lag pa g-yas pa
T02D1914:198a-32: la aa las bskyed pa'i zla ba la dzam gis
T02D1914:198a-33: bskyed pa'i bum pa'i chus nge'i zhal du drang ngo
T02D1914:198a-35: de nas ni nor la sogs pa'i 'dod pa bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1914:198a-36: de bzhin du sngags la dbang ba gzhan yang rjes su dpags te sbyar yang nyes pa med do //
T02D1914:198a-37: da ni 'jig rten pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:198a-38: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:198a-39: 'dir yang ji ltar gsungs pa'i pho brang du 'jam
T02D1914:198a-40: pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas lus la sogs pa
T02D1914:198a-41: byin gyis brlab pa dang ldan te /
T02D1914:198a-42: de'i mdun du kshi 'bar ba las gnod sbyin mo
T02D1914:198a-43: ral pa sil bu dang rna cha la sogs pa
T02D1914:198a-44: dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i gzugs phyag rgya bzhi dang
T02D1914:198a-45: gshin rje gshed kyis mgor brgyan pa kha phrad par
T02D1914:198a-46: bsams te / snying gar gshin rje gshed kyi sngags
T02D1914:198b-0: bkod nas drag shul du sbyor @198b ba brtsams pa'i
T02D1914:198b-1: spras nam mkha' la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin mo thams
T02D1914:198b-3: de bzhin du yang 'jig rten pa'i rig pa can
T02D1914:198b-4: dang srin mo dang 'phrog ma la sogs pa yang
T02D1914:198b-5: rang gi sa bon dang las las 'phags te /
T02D1914:198b-6: da ni de dag gi yon tan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:198b-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:198b-8: kun grub pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1914:198b-9: gang gis yang mi snang ba ni mdog mtshungs so
T02D1914:198b-10: // rigs 'dzin dag gi zhes pa ni rig 'dzin
T02D1914:198b-11: grub pa dag ni mthong nas gzhan dga' bar 'gyur
T02D1914:198b-12: // zhe'o // gnod sbyin ni grub na nor gyi bdag por 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1914:198b-13: da ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs la gtogs pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D1914:198b-14: de gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:198b-15: de'i sku nyid ces pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi
T02D1914:198b-16: don du dam pa'i mtshan ma ru shes par bya'o
T02D1914:198b-17: // chen po zhes pa ni rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1914:198b-18: cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni de'i yan lag tshul dang ldan pa'o ;
T02D1914:198b-19: / lo grangs bcu gnyis zhes pa ni nges pa med pa'i don du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1914:198b-20: spyan gyi go 'phang zhes pa ni de'i rig ma'o //
T02D1914:198b-22: rdo rje mtshan zhes pa ni gsang gnas kyi sbyor
T02D1914:198b-23: ba ste de dag gis ni dam tshig gi dkyil
T02D1914:198b-24: 'khor bstan to // sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas la ;
T02D1914:198b-25: / zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas te dam tshig gi ngo bo'o //
T02D1914:198b-26: dus bzhi zhes pa ni dbang po dman pa dag
T02D1914:198b-27: zla ba drug 'das na lo gcig tu dpyid la
T02D1914:198b-29: kha cig ni tho rangs la sogs pa'o zhes zer te /
T02D1914:198b-30: de ni las dang po pa yin la 'di ni
T02D1914:198b-31: ye shes kun la dbang thob pas nyin mtshan med
T02D1914:198b-32: par sbyor ba ste de bas na de ni rigs
T02D1914:198b-33: so // bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya //
T02D1914:198b-34: zhes pa ni de dag la bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba
T02D1914:198b-35: spyad pa ste drug las zas gzhan dag ni ma
T02D1914:198b-36: zos na zhes pa'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
T02D1914:198b-38: ye shes rgya mtsho ni rig ma'o //
T02D1914:198b-39: de dag kun zhes pa ni thun mong gi don du gsungs so //
T02D1914:198b-40: nor rku zhing zhes pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nor gyi rdzas 'phrog pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1914:198b-41: bsad pa zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor bsad pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1914:198b-42: de bzhin du sgyu ma'i rnam pas brdzun zhes pa dang /
T02D1914:199a-1: zhes pa'i 'dod chags dag ni bsrung ba'i dam tshig bzhi ste de nyid sdom pa'o //
T02D1914:199a-2: kyo ba mo zhes pa ni 'dod chags rdo rje'i
T02D1914:199a-3: yid 'phrog pa ste gos dkar mo dang 'dra ba'i
T02D1914:199a-4: rig ma'o // mchog sems zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'am mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1914:199a-5: gzhan gyi go 'phang gsungs pa rdo rje can gyi zhes te /
T02D1914:199a-6: gzhan dag gi yang rang gi rig ma'i phyag rgya'i go 'phang zhe'o //
T02D1914:199a-7: yi ge zhes pa ni sngags kyis bskul ba zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1914:199a-8: de kho na las sgrub pa nye bar brtags te
T02D1914:199a-9: gsungs pa rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes brten zhe'o
T02D1914:199a-11: zhes pa ni gtso bo gsum gtsor gsungs pa'o //
T02D1914:199a-12: le'u bcu drug pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D1914:199a-14: // / da ni sgrub pa chen por grags pa la
T02D1914:199a-15: gtogs pa bsrung ba'i dam tshig gtsor gsungs pa de
T02D1914:199a-16: nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:199a-17: gsol ba btab ces pa ni bsrung ba la sogs
T02D1914:199a-18: pa'i dam tshig zhu bar 'dod pa'i bsam gtan bstod
T02D1914:199a-19: pa'i phyir ro // ye shes che zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes pas so //
T02D1914:199a-20: rdo rje dbyings zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1914:199a-21: rang bzhin du bzung na rkyen du smra ba yin
T02D1914:199a-22: no // rdo rje gsum mchog ni sku la sogs pa'i mchog go //
T02D1914:199a-23: dkyil 'khor gsum zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kho na mchog ce'o //
T02D1914:199a-24: de bzhin du gzhan la yang rang gi ye shes
T02D1914:199a-25: rnams dang yon tan las rjes su dpags te shes
T02D1914:199a-26: par bya'o // de'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1914:199a-27: sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi //
T02D1914:199a-29: bstod tshig dag kho na la rdo rje 'chang bas yongs su dag pa bsdus te gsungs pa /
T02D1914:199a-30: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste chos kyi
T02D1914:199a-31: dbyings ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes te de
T02D1914:199a-32: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge med ce'o //
T02D1914:199a-33: 'od gsal ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1914:199a-34: yongs su dag pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1914:199a-35: dri ma med pa ni lhag ma gnyis te nam
T02D1914:199a-36: mkha'i dbyings bzhin zhes pa ni kun la sbyar ro
T02D1914:199a-37: // da ni 'dod pa'i don gsol ba btab pa
T02D1914:199a-38: kho na la gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la
T02D1914:199a-39: // sogs pa'o // dam tshig bzhi zhes pa ni
T02D1914:199a-40: bsrung bar bya ba'i sdom pa brtul zhugs kyi skabs
T02D1914:199b-0: @199b sha chen zhes pa ni bza' ba'i dam tshig ste bshad gci la sogs pa yang sbyar ro //
T02D1914:199b-1: 'di ni sku la nye bar brtags pa ste de bzhin 'og tu yang sbyar ro //
T02D1914:199b-2: khams gsum pa rnams kyi dam tshig las rang sangs
T02D1914:199b-3: rgyas kyi dam tshig gsungs pa de nas zhes pa
T02D1914:199b-5: lus kyi ston pa ni ngag gi lus kyi bya bas sems can dag gi don byed la /
T02D1914:199b-6: thugs rdo rje chen po'i sngags pas de bsdu ba'i
T02D1914:199b-7: phyir de'i tshul gnas pa ni rdo rje skul rab
T02D1914:199b-8: tu gnas she'o // 'dir ni rang sangs rgyas sgrub pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1914:199b-9: theg pa chen po'i don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1914:199b-10: de bzhin 'og tu yang shes par bya'o //
T02D1914:199b-11: byed pa'i ye shes spangs zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa mi shes pa'o //
T02D1914:199b-12: mos pa chung du zhes pa ni theg pa chen po la ma mos pa'o //
T02D1914:199b-13: gti mug lam gyis zhes pa ni mtshan ma'i rnam
T02D1914:199b-14: par shes pa med de de las ngag sgom pa
T02D1914:199b-15: ni byis pa dag skrag par byed pas na 'jigs
T02D1914:199b-16: shing zhes te // de kho nas sangs rgyas su sbyor ro //
T02D1914:199b-17: da ni aom dang gundhe las gyur pa'i tshangs pa
T02D1914:199b-18: gdong bzhi pa ser po phyag rgya chen po bzhi
T02D1914:199b-19: dang ldan pa gundhe thogs pa mi bskyod pas dbub
T02D1914:199b-20: rgyan pa bsgoms te de'i dam tshig bsgoms na phyis
T02D1914:199b-21: 'dod ba can gyis sku rdo rjer 'gyur zhes te
T02D1914:199b-22: / de bzhin du drag po dang /
T02D1914:199b-23: byi snu'i rigs las shes par bya'o //
T02D1914:199b-24: de la drag po ni aa dang tri sh'u la las bskyed pa nag mo'o //
T02D1914:199b-25: byi snu ni h'um dang dung las bskyed pa dkar po'o //
T02D1914:199b-26: de gnyis kyi yang 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
T02D1914:199b-27: gtogs 'dod ces te smad chen ni drag po ste
T02D1914:199b-28: 'dod pa tsam gyis gsung thugs rdo rje'i skur 'gyur
T02D1914:199b-29: ro // gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig kyang ngo bo tsam gsungs te /
T02D1914:199b-30: de dag kyang rang rang gi sa bon la sogs
T02D1914:199b-31: pa spyi'i cho gas bsgrub po zhes sngar bshad zin
T02D1914:199b-32: to // 'og ces pa ni phal cher ri'i 'og na gnas pa yin no //
T02D1914:199b-33: bdug pa zhes pa ni tshil chen gyi bdug pa'o //
T02D1914:199b-34: gnas kyi mtshan zhes pa ni ma mo'i gnas so //
T02D1914:199b-35: phan 'dod pa zhes pa ni snying rjes brlan pa'i
T02D1914:199b-36: rnal 'byor pa ste des bsdus pa'i dngos po ngo
T02D1914:199b-37: bo nyid 'byung ba'i dam tshig spyad par bya zhes
T02D1914:199b-38: bsdus pa'o // nyan thos la sogs pa dag kyang
T02D1914:199b-39: theg pa chen po'i sgrib pa gdong sbyong bas khams
T02D1914:200a-2: de dag gi don yang gsungs pa /
T02D1914:200a-3: ci rigs 'gro ba'i don dang ni //
T02D1914:200a-5: yang lus la sogs pa'i dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1914:200a-6: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste rdo rje
T02D1914:200a-7: dra pa zhes pa ni srid pas ma gos pa'o
T02D1914:200a-8: // tshig gi lam nas zhes pa ni brdzun la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1914:200a-9: yid kyi rdo rje zhes pa ni mnar sems la
T02D1914:200a-10: sogs pa ste de ni dngos su bstan pa ma
T02D1914:200a-11: yin te rtsa ba chad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1914:200a-12: des ni rang byung na'ang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su dag par bsgom zhes so //
T02D1914:200a-13: de dag ni thams cad la spyod pas na kun du bzang po zhes so //
T02D1914:200a-14: sbyor ba shin tu nges pa rnams kyi dam tshig
T02D1914:200a-15: gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1914:200a-16: / sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba nyid tshogs yin gyi /
T02D1914:200a-17: phyag gis ni ma yin te zhe'am /
T02D1914:200a-18: yang na phyi'i blos tshogs mi 'gyur zhe'o //
T02D1914:200a-19: 'o na ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1914:200a-20: de nas yang zhes pa ste /
T02D1914:200a-21: kun du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dbyer med pas bsams te zhe'o //
T02D1914:200a-22: rdo rje gsum sbyor ba zhes pa ni dang po
T02D1914:200a-23: la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pas zhes
T02D1914:200a-24: pa'i don to // de nas yang tshogs chen po bsam pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:200a-25: sems can khams rnams zhes pa ste /
T02D1914:200a-26: thams cad bdag dang dbyer med par phyag 'tshal lo zhes bsam pas bskul lo zhe'o //
T02D1914:200a-27: da ni chen po'i sgrub pa chen po rdzogs nas /
T02D1914:200a-28: mchod pa'i dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1914:200a-29: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir ni nang gi gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1914:200a-31: bsrung ba'i dam tshig bzhi'i rkyen gyi dam tshig gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:200a-32: mi snang ba zhes pa ni dam tshig bzhi po
T02D1914:200a-33: kho na rkyen med pa'i blos blta bar dka' ba'i
T02D1914:200a-34: phyir ro // rdo rje ma zhes pa ni las
T02D1914:200a-35: kyi phyag rgya kho na gsungs pa yin te de
T02D1914:200a-36: phyir ro // ni rkyen no // yang rdzas kyang
T02D1914:200a-37: rtag tu dbrog ces pa ni de la sbyor bas
T02D1914:200a-38: phyung ba'i byang chub kyi sems zos pas bdag tu
T02D1914:200a-39: 'dzin pa'i rdzas phrogs pa ste sangs rgyas kyi 'khor
T02D1914:200a-40: gsod pa la sogs pa yang sbyor ro //
T02D1914:200a-41: yang rig 'dzin gyi dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1914:200a-42: de nas zhes te rig 'dzin sbyor ba po dang
T02D1914:200a-43: mo la dkon mchog dpal dang tshe dpag med dbu
T02D1914:200b-0: rgyan du bsam @200b zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1914:200b-1: las dang po pa rnams kyi dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1914:200b-2: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:200b-3: lus kyi rdo rje la sogs pa la phyi rol
T02D1914:200b-4: gyi kha zas kho na'i ston mo spyad ces mdor
T02D1914:200b-5: gsungs te / 'di'i sbyor ba ni 'og nas ston to //
T02D1914:200b-6: phyi rol zhes pa ni bsam gtan gyi bas la dbang ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1914:200b-7: da ni thugs kyi chos bstan pa gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:200b-8: cang mi gsung zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid la brjod du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1914:200b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de'i don
T02D1914:200b-10: zhus pa gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs
T02D1914:200b-12: de'i lan gsungs pa de nas zhes te /
T02D1914:200b-13: de ni brjod pa'i tshig gang dmigs su med pa
T02D1914:200b-14: de la ngo bo nyid med pas bsams te mi
T02D1914:200b-15: gsung zhe'o // bsam pa brtan pa gsungs pa rigs kyi bu zhes te /
T02D1914:200b-16: sku la sogs pa ma skyes pa nyid la brjod
T02D1914:200b-17: pa ni gzhan dag skyes pa'i rnam pas log par
T02D1914:200b-18: zin te 'gyur snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
T02D1914:200b-19: de nas yang zhus pa phyin ci log tu zin
T02D1914:200b-20: pa kun 'byung ba mi brtag tu gsol zhes pa
T02D1914:200b-22: mthu'i ngo bo nyid spyod par gyur pa ste /
T02D1914:200b-23: mi skye ba'i ston pa nyid yin la /
T02D1914:200b-24: bdag cag kyang de'i rjes su 'dzin pas log par mi 'dzin te zhe'o //
T02D1914:200b-25: ngo bo nyid med par bsams nas zhes pa de la zhus pa /
T02D1914:200b-26: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thob
T02D1914:200b-27: pa dag 'o na ci sngar bshad pa dag chos
T02D1914:200b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo yod par shes nas
T02D1914:200b-29: 'chad dam snyam pas na de skad ma gsung shig
T02D1914:200b-30: ces pa'o // mngon par shes pa zhes pa ni
T02D1914:200b-31: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa las mnyam pa
T02D1914:200b-33: de'i lan gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:200b-34: rjes su 'dzin zhes pa de nged kyis kyang mi
T02D1914:200b-35: shes shing mi 'dzin zhes te ngo bo nyid med
T02D1914:200b-36: pa'i phyir ro // yang tshangs pa la sogs pa ni sems can chen po zhes te /
T02D1914:200b-37: 'dod chags chen pos 'dul bas na chen por gtogs pa'o //
T02D1914:200b-38: chos nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni de rang
T02D1914:200b-39: bzhin can de snam bu dkar po bzhin te 'bras
T02D1914:200b-40: bu thob pa'i snod yin no //
T02D1914:200b-41: rdo rje ye shes thob ces pa ni mngon par
T02D1914:200b-42: shes pa kho na ste rkyen gyis sangs rgyas thob
T02D1914:200b-43: pa'i phyir rtog pa de mi 'byung zhe'o //
T02D1914:201a-1: rjes su ston pas gsal bar gsungs pa de nas zhes te /
T02D1914:201a-2: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis ngag la skye ba
T02D1914:201a-3: med do zhes chos kyi dbyings su rtog pa smra
T02D1914:201a-4: ba dag ni yang dag par smra ba ma yin
T02D1914:201a-5: no zhes pa'o // de kho na brtan por bya
T02D1914:201a-6: ba gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1914:201a-7: no zhes pa'o // ste / nam mkha' ni ci
T02D1914:201a-8: la yang mi gnas so zhes pa 'di yin no
T02D1914:201a-9: no zhes pa'o // ste / // de la ngo mtshar gsungs pa /
T02D1914:201a-10: ae ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste lus la
T02D1914:201a-11: sogs pa'i dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kho na
T02D1914:201a-12: las lus la sogs pa bsgom ste de kho na
T02D1914:201a-13: // ae ma'o rdo rje tshig smras pa //

T02D1914:201a-16: gsungs pa de ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1914:201a-17: / rdo rje'i sku zhes pa ni rtag pa ste
T02D1914:201a-18: de'i spyin bor rdo rje zhes pa mi bskyod pa'o
T02D1914:201a-19: / // sku gsum las byung ba zhes pa ni kha dog gsum ste /
T02D1914:201a-20: des rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1914:201a-21: rnam par g-yo ba zhes pa ni shing la sogs
T02D1914:201a-22: pa las byas pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi
T02D1914:201a-23: / de dang sems dang bcas pa'i g-yo ba dang ldan par shes pa'i don to //
T02D1914:201a-24: rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin zhes pa ni mi bskyod
T02D1914:201a-25: pa dbu la gnas pa ni rdo rje 'dzin la
T02D1914:201a-26: bzhi ni 'khor lo 'dzin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1914:201a-28: thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis ;
T02D1914:201a-30: sangs rgyas rdo rje can rnams kun //
T02D1914:201a-31: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1914:201a-32: de'i rig ma'i sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug nas chags pas mnyes par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1914:201a-33: dbyings las byung bar gyur pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:201a-34: khyu mchog ces pa ni lha'i mchog ste bdag nyid do //
T02D1914:201a-35: yang bdag gi bsnyen pa la sogs pa de dag gcig tu dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1914:201a-36: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:201a-37: dam tshig rgya chen zhes pa bsnyen pa la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs dag go //
T02D1914:201a-38: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1914:201a-39: mtshan nyid kun gyis zhes pa phung po la sogs pa zhes pa'am /

T02D1914:201a-41: yang gsang ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1914:201a-42: de nas zhes pa ste sems kyi cho ga kho
T02D1914:201a-43: na gtso bo yin gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya ni
T02D1914:201b-0: g-yeng ba'i rgyu @201b yin pas ma yin no //
T02D1914:201b-1: yang bskul ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig gsungs pa de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1914:201b-4: dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun /
T02D1914:201b-5: zhes pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams zhes
T02D1914:201b-6: pa ste rdo rje gsum zhes pa ni sbyor ba
T02D1914:201b-7: gsum ste de kho na gcig tu sems la byas

T02D1914:201b-13: lus rnams la yang de skad de skye mched rnam
T02D1914:201b-14: par dag pa'o // mkha' dbyings zhes pa ni khams
T02D1914:201b-15: kyi zhar la gsungs pa ste rdo rje zhes pa
T02D1914:201b-17: 'dzin pa ni gzhi'i nam mkha' zhes te ston pa ni ma yin no ;
T02D1914:201b-18: / mi ldog pa'i dbang gis yon tan dang rtsa
T02D1914:201b-19: ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la

T02D1914:201b-22: ba'i byang chub kyi sems te sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1914:201b-23: kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1914:201b-26: yang 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'og zlos su lan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:201b-27: rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:201b-28: yang zhus pa ci'i slad du zhe'o //
T02D1914:201b-29: gtan tshigs kyi lan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:201b-30: slob dpon de ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:201b-31: gsang ba 'dus pa dbang bskur ma thag tu slob
T02D1914:201b-32: dpon zhes ming thob pas na slob dpon de ni
T02D1914:201b-33: zhe'o // yang de la sri zhu bya ba'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1914:201b-35: de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs
T02D1914:201b-36: bcu nas lhags nas slob dpon de mchod de de
T02D1914:201b-38: ngag gi sri zhu yang 'di skad du bdag cag
T02D1914:201b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi slob dpon khyod pha
T02D1914:201b-40: yin no // de bzhin du ma yin no //
T02D1914:201b-41: ston pa yin no zhes 'dod de /
T02D1914:201b-42: slar yang rang gi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02D1914:202a-1: slob ma rnams kyis de la ji ltar gzung ba'i
T02D1914:202a-2: rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste zhes
T02D1914:202a-4: slob mas de ltar gzung ngo zhe'o //
T02D1914:202a-5: yang zhus pa ci'i slad du zhe'o //
T02D1914:202a-6: lan btab pa'i rigs kyi bu zhes te /
T02D1914:202a-7: byang chub kyi sems dang slob dpon mi gnyis pas byang chub kyi sems de skad do //
T02D1914:202a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam
T02D1914:202a-9: du de 'dra'i slob dpon la brnyas pa dag mnar
T02D1914:202a-10: med par skye'o snyam nas 'jigs pa skyes te cang
T02D1914:202a-12: yang slob dpon gyi sri zhu bsten par bya ba'i
T02D1914:202a-13: phyir ched du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs
T02D1914:202a-14: pa de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste

T02D1914:202a-16: ba 'dus pas dbang bskur ma thag sangs rgyas thams
T02D1914:202a-17: cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa ste /
T02D1914:202a-18: tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi grangs su bgrang ba yin no //

T02D1914:202a-31: zhes pa la sogs pa ni ji lta ba'i gnas gsungs pa'o //

T02D1914:202a-34: kyis de dag bskul ba ste de yang bzang po

T02D1914:202a-43: no // ye shes 'khor lo zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i 'od kyis bskul ba dag ste /
T02D1914:202a-45: ye shes sems dpa' gang reg pa //
T02D1914:202b-0: ye @202b shes 'khor lo zhes su bshad //

T02D1914:202b-3: la sogs pas de dag zhugs par bya'o zhes pa

T02D1914:202b-7: mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis //
T02D1914:202b-9: rdo rje dri med gsum dag gis //
T02D1914:202b-10: zhes gang du bstan pa de nyid kyis shes pa'i don to //

T02D1914:202b-14: // dkyil 'khor dang brtul zhugs dang 'brel pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:202b-15: slob dpon zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:202b-16: de ni rang dang slob ma dag la bdag po snying gar bsam mo //
T02D1914:202b-17: gnas gsum gyis zhes pa ni nam mkha'i sangs rgyas
T02D1914:202b-18: bskul ba la rdo rje gsum gyi gnas sam yang

T02D1914:202b-22: bo bskam pa gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la

T02D1914:203a-7: gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste

T02D1914:203a-10: dang reg pa dag kyang zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1914:203a-12: kyang 'bar bar bsams te bdag gis khas blangs nas
T02D1914:203a-14: phyi'i bud med kho na ched du btsal ba bstan

T02D1914:203a-27: yang nyam chung ba bsal ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1914:203a-29: bdag gi spyi bor mtho gang tsam du zla ba
T02D1914:203a-30: la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga la aom gyis mtshan
T02D1914:203a-31: pa ; dbugs kyi lcags kyus drangs te lha rnams
T02D1914:203a-32: tshim par byas so zhes pas te de yang gsungs
T02D1914:203a-33: pa ; pa / rang gi snying po de nyid sems dpa'i tshe //
T02D1914:203a-35: lus ngag yid ni tshim par bya //
T02D1914:203a-36: zhes pa'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs so //
T02D1914:203a-37: yang sbyor ba brtan pa rnams kyi dam tshig gsungs pa de nas zhes te /

T02D1914:203a-39: dag gis ni byang chub la spyod par 'dod pa

T02D1914:203a-41: de yang gsungs pa sems nyid cho ga thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:203b-0: da ni bsam @203b gtan pa'i las las lus drug
T02D1914:203b-1: 'byin pa la sogs pa gsungs pa de nas zhes
T02D1914:203b-5: bhr'um zhes pa 'dir rtag pa 'am gtsug tor 'khor

T02D1914:203b-7: bskyed pa'i 'khor lo la bhr'um nyid bsams te gong
T02D1914:203b-8: du rtag pa la bstan pa bzhin gtor bar bya'o
T02D1914:203b-9: zhes so // ci ste gnod par 'dod na sku
T02D1914:203b-10: ser por bsgyur nas bhr'um gyi 'od ser pos gnas
T02D1914:203b-11: gsum du bsdus nas de nyid du kha zas dug

T02D1914:203b-13: zhes so // mnan par bya'o ; / ci ste
T02D1914:203b-14: 'dren na bh'um kho nas gong du h'um la sbyar
T02D1914:203b-15: ba'i cho ga ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1914:203b-16: 'od zer gsum zhes pa ni mnan pa ser po
T02D1914:203b-17: dang gzhan la nag po dang dkar po ste de
T02D1914:203b-18: dag gi sa gnas gsum la sogs pa nas 'byin
T02D1914:203b-19: par 'gyur zhe'o // da ni sngags kyi cho ga
T02D1914:203b-20: gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1914:203b-21: par 'gyur zhe'o // / 'di'i don ni gang yang
T02D1914:203b-22: rung pa'i rnal 'byor bas gur kum la sogs pas
T02D1914:203b-23: grog 'am shing lo dag la rdo rje rgya gram
T02D1914:203b-24: par 'gyur zhe'o // / bris te / de'i lte ba la yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D1914:203b-25: de'i lte ba la ha dang bsgrub bya'i ming yang
T02D1914:203b-26: shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs la mi bskyod pa la
T02D1914:203b-27: sogs pa yang mtshams bzhi la spyan ma la sogs
T02D1914:203b-28: pa de bzhin du gzugs kyir do rje ma la
T02D1914:203b-29: sogs pa yang gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod
T02D1914:203b-30: do // gshin rje gshed la sogs pa yang phyogs bzhir dgod do //
T02D1914:203b-31: mu khyud ni phred pa'i sngags kyis bskor te gzhag go //
T02D1914:203b-32: de nas yang de la ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1914:203b-33: ye shes kyi lha rnams dgug pa la sogs pa
T02D1914:203b-34: byas nas legs par mchod de ras la sogs pa'i
T02D1914:203b-35: snod du bzhugs nas bsgrub bya yang khrus la sogs
T02D1914:203b-36: pa yang byas te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su
T02D1914:203b-37: gtong ba la sogs pa byas te sa de'i mgul
T02D1914:203b-38: pa 'am dpung pa la gdags pa byas na gdon
T02D1914:203b-39: la sogs pa bsrung bar 'gyur zhe'o //
T02D1914:203b-40: da ni thun mong gi bsgrub pa las lus pa
T02D1914:203b-41: mig rnon gyi cho ga gsungs pa de nas zhes
T02D1914:203b-43: de'i don ni gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1914:203b-44: lam gyi bzhi mdo la sogs par tshes nyi shu
T02D1914:204a-0: dgu'i nam phyed na bhandha la khrag chen @204a *
T02D1914:204a-1: // pos padmo bris pa'i steng du 'dug ste /
T02D1914:204a-2: yang bhandha gcig gi nang du bdud rtsi lnga dang
T02D1914:204a-3: tshil chen po la sogs pa'i bzhus pa'i mar la
T02D1914:204a-4: ras kyi skud pa sdong bu padma'i rtsa ba'i skud
T02D1914:204a-5: pas dkris te me btang bas bhandha gcig gis steng
T02D1914:204a-6: nas phub ste sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1914:204a-7: de nas yang bhandha blangs te gong du gsungs pa'i
T02D1914:204a-8: phreng ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab ste mig la
T02D1914:204a-9: bskus na sku la sogs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D1914:204a-11: da ni rgyud 'di ni yi ge gsum gyis bsdus pa'i che ba ston te /
T02D1914:204a-12: de nas zhes pa ni gsang ba'i yi ge rnam
T02D1914:204a-13: par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes pa nas cang mi
T02D1914:204a-14: smra bar gyur to zhes pa ni de ma thag
T02D1914:204a-15: pa'o // byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag
T02D1914:204a-16: ces pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang ba'i yi
T02D1914:204a-17: ge mtho ba cing mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes
T02D1914:204a-18: pa'o // pa dag go // dad cing sgrub par
T02D1914:204a-19: 'gyur zhes pa ni ji ltar na skul ba mchis
T02D1914:204a-21: da ni rgyud 'di rnyed par dka' ba dang lam
T02D1914:204a-22: nye ba dang 'bras bu chen po dag gis gzhan
T02D1914:204a-23: las khyad par du gyur pa gsungs pa de nas
T02D1914:204a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:204a-25: de la de nas zhes pa ni dngos grub rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa'i de ma thag go //
T02D1914:204a-27: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa ni ma gsungs pa'i rgyu 'dri ba'o //
T02D1914:204a-29: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste de'i
T02D1914:204a-30: dus sems can rnams la gsang ba chen po bshad
T02D1914:204a-31: pa'i skal ba med do zhes pa yin no //
T02D1914:204a-32: des ni rnyed par dka' ba ston to //
T02D1914:204a-33: 'on kyang zhes pa ni don chen po byed pa
T02D1914:204a-34: yin no zhes pa ste skad cig ces pa la
T02D1914:204a-35: sogs pa ni lam nye bar ston to //
T02D1914:204a-36: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ces pa la sogs pas ni 'bras bu chen po ston te /
T02D1914:204a-37: khyad par gyur pa kho na yin no //
T02D1914:204a-38: tshe 'di nyid la zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba
T02D1914:204a-39: dag gi rkyen gyis sangs rgyas dang dbang bskur nas
T02D1914:204a-40: chog chen pos bsgrub pa dag ni bla na med
T02D1914:204a-41: pa'i sangs rgyas tshe 'di nyid la 'grub pa'i phyir
T02D1914:204a-42: ro // sdug bsngal gsum zhes pa ni lus la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal lo //
T02D1914:204a-43: gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa zhes pa ni shin tu zab par ston to //
T02D1914:204a-44: da ni le'u dang po la gtogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D1914:204b-0: @204b gshegs pa'i phrin las la 'bras bu rdo rje
T02D1914:204b-2: chos kyi skur bzhugs pa la gong du phyung ba'i
T02D1914:204b-3: mtshams kyi lha mos bskul ba gsungs pa de nas
T02D1914:204b-4: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:204b-5: de la de nas zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung
T02D1914:204b-6: ba'i chos ma yin zhes pa nas cang mi gsung
T02D1914:204b-7: bar gyur to zhes pa'i de ma thag go //
T02D1914:204b-8: gnas kyi dbang phyug ces pa ni gnas kyi bdag po'o //
T02D1914:204b-9: dga' ba zhes pa ni reg pa las byung ba'o //
T02D1914:204b-10: yid 'ong zhes pa ni bde ba'o //
T02D1914:204b-11: de kho na don chen te bsgrub par bya ba'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1914:204b-12: 'dod pa zhes kyang de kho nas te des bskyab
T02D1914:204b-13: tu gsol zhes nas gnad la bor te bskul ba
T02D1914:204b-14: gsungs pa / mgon po gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1914:204b-15: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams kyang go sla bas bdag gis ni ma bshad do //
T02D1914:204b-16: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes pa ni de ma
T02D1914:204b-17: thag dam tshig las gyur pa 'khor lo'i rgyan nye
T02D1914:204b-18: bar gnas pa'i tshul gyis zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1914:204b-19: da ni rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa gtogs pa /
T02D1914:204b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1914:204b-21: zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu dbang bskur ba gsungs
T02D1914:204b-22: pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1914:204b-24: las thugs kar zhugs so zhes pa'i de ma thag
T02D1914:204b-25: go // nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa ni rig ma'i gsang pa'i nang ngo //
T02D1914:204b-26: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes pa ni sku
T02D1914:204b-27: la sogs pa'i bzhi chos kyi sku ye shes lnga
T02D1914:204b-29: kun du bzang po zhes pa ni spyi'i rnam pa ste /
T02D1914:204b-30: phye nas ni dam tshig rdo rje la sogs pa de yang gsungs pa /
T02D1914:204b-31: sa yi snying po la sogs drug / ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:204b-32: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa //
T02D1914:204b-33: zhes pa ni ye shes kho na rdo rje ste de thob par byed pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02D1914:204b-34: btsun mo las 'das zhes pa ni rdo rje sems
T02D1914:204b-35: dpa'i btsun mo'i bha ga las chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1914:204b-36: pho brang du 'thon zhes pa ste 'thon zhes kyang
T02D1914:204b-37: gong ma'i don la ngo mtshar gsungs pa /
T02D1914:204b-38: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:204b-39: 'dod chags kyi yi ge zhes pa ni 'dod chags las gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1914:205a-0: da ni sgrar snang ba'i rgyud kyis phan gdags pa'i phyir bka' @205a * //
T02D1914:205a-1: bsgrags pa'i don du bsgo ba gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:205a-2: de la de nas zhes pa ni gong du 'di
T02D1914:205a-3: gsum mo zhes pa nas phyag 'tshal nas cang mi
T02D1914:205a-4: gsung bar gyur to zhes pa'i de ma thag ste
T02D1914:205a-5: / 'di ni spyir bsgo ba yin no //
T02D1914:205a-6: yang dmigs kyis rdo rje chos la bsgo ba gsungs pa /
T02D1914:205a-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1914:205a-8: yang khas blangs pa gsungs pa de nas zhes te /
T02D1914:205a-9: cang mi gsung ba zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i don rdzogs pa'i don to //
T02D1914:205a-10: da ni bsgo ba de kho na de bzhin bgyi'o
T02D1914:205a-11: zhes khas blangs nas sems can rnams la bsgrags pa'i
T02D1914:205a-12: phrin las gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs
T02D1914:205a-13: pa ste / de la de nas zhes pa ni
T02D1914:205a-14: rtsa ba dang phyi ma'i sgra'i rgyud kyi rnam pa
T02D1914:205a-15: mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i de ma thag go //
T02D1914:205a-16: de nas sems can rnams la rdo rje gsum sems
T02D1914:205a-17: dpa'i rgyud bsgrags so zhes pa ste yongs su rdzogs
T02D1914:205a-18: pa'i don to // rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs nas rang
T02D1914:205a-19: gi las la zhugs pa gsungs pa de nas zhes
T02D1914:205a-21: de la de nas zhes pa ni de bzhin bgyi'o
T02D1914:205a-22: zhes pa nas cang mi gsung zhes pa'i de ma
T02D1914:205a-23: thag go // cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes
T02D1914:205a-24: pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi lus dang de
T02D1914:205a-25: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid
T02D1914:205a-26: la dmigs pa kho na'i phyir te /
T02D1914:205a-27: 'di'i phyir rnal 'byor pa dag kyang sbyor ba rnam
T02D1914:205a-28: pa gsum rdzogs nas gshegs su gsol ba la rdo
T02D1914:205a-29: rje gsum gyi thugs kar mtha' dag bsdus te /
T02D1914:205a-30: de yang nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du bsams pa'o //
T02D1914:205a-32: de nyid bdag nyid gsung ldan pa'i //
T02D1914:205a-33: sangs rgyas thogs med slar gshegs gsol //
T02D1914:205a-35: le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs te /
T02D1914:205a-36: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D1914:205a-38: // / da ni phyi ma zhes grags pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1914:205a-39: kha cig na re sangs rgyas kyis ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las rtogs la /
T02D1914:205a-40: byang chub sems dpas ni ma rtogs pas byams pa la sogs pas zhus zhes zer ro //
T02D1914:205a-41: de yang rigs par kho bos ni ma mthong ste ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1914:205a-42: thos te rtogs nas zhes pa dang /
T02D1914:205b-0: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhes pa'i @205b
T02D1914:205b-1: tshig gis na ma rtogs pa yang ma yin la
T02D1914:205b-2: rang gi ched kyang ma yin no //
T02D1914:205b-3: byams pa la sogs pas gsol to zhes 'brel to //
T02D1914:205b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pa smos
T02D1914:205b-6: te bde ba la sogs pa gsum ni yang ste
T02D1914:205b-7: / de yang rim pas dri ma bsal ba'i chos nyid mthong bar 'dod de rigs pa'i chos so //
T02D1914:205b-8: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni sbyar snang ba ste lung ngo //
T02D1914:205b-10: ji lta bur zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
T02D1914:205b-11: dngos po thams cad kyis zhes pa ni ye shes ma lus pas so //
T02D1914:205b-12: dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin zhes pa ni gzhi'i le'u la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1914:205b-13: mthong zhing zhes pa ni rigs pa'i chos te ye shes kyi mig gis shes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1914:205b-14: thos te rtogs zhes pa ni lung gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1914:205b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la zhes pa ni 'khor rnams la 'gro ba'i tshul lo //
T02D1914:205b-16: chos mthong ba dang ldan zhes pa ni gzor smos
T02D1914:205b-17: pa ste thos te rtogs shes pa yang sbyar ro
T02D1914:205b-18: // chos de gnyis nyid gsol ba ae ma'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:205b-19: thams cad bzang bas na kun du bzang po ste /
T02D1914:205b-20: de'i rdo rje gsum la kun gyi ni zhes pa
T02D1914:205b-21: la thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum bzhugs zhes te
T02D1914:205b-22: / des ni sangs rgyas rnams gnyis su med do zhes so //

T02D1914:205b-24: ngo bo nyid ces pa ni chos nyid ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1914:205b-25: de ni lung rtogs pa'i mchog gsol ba ste rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1914:205b-26: byang chub sems gnas thob pa zhes pa rigs pa
T02D1914:205b-27: ste rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ba'i rkyen gyis
T02D1914:205b-29: rdzu 'phrul che zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs te de ni phrin las so //
T02D1914:205b-30: de ni gnyis su kun du bzang po'i sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1914:205b-31: de gnyis kho na las tshigs su bcad pa gcig
T02D1914:205b-32: gis ngo mtshar gsungs pa ae ma zhes pa la
T02D1914:205b-33: sogs pa'o // 'di zhes pa ni ngo bo'o //

T02D1914:205b-35: dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir zhib ste dam pa'o //
T02D1914:205b-36: ae ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyan zhes pa phyed
T02D1914:205b-37: 'og mas phrin las la ngo mtshar ba dang dam
T02D1914:206a-1: 'dod pa'i don zhu bar brtsams pa /
T02D1914:206a-2: gsang ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste bla na med pa zhes pa ni nang gi'o //
T02D1914:206a-3: zhu ba'i don dmigs kyis bsal bas gsungs pa /
T02D1914:206a-4: ae ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02D1914:206a-6: gang gsungs yang dag gsungs ba yi ;
T02D1914:206a-7: / rtogs dka' gsol zhing mchis zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1914:206a-8: ci'i don du zhe na de nyid kyi don ched
T02D1914:206a-9: du de'i rim pas sems can byang chub dang sbyor
T02D1914:206a-10: ba la phan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1914:206a-11: legs so zhes pa ni zhus pa'o //
T02D1914:206a-12: yang legs so zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' nyid la'o //
T02D1914:206a-13: yang legs so zhes pa ni zhus pa de don yod pas so //
T02D1914:206a-14: zhus pa'i tshig rnams ni lan las bshad do //
T02D1914:206a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dmigs pa ni gnyis su med pa la gzhag pa ste /
T02D1914:206a-16: de'i don brjod du med pas na cang mi gsung zhes rtsa ba'i skabs su bshad do //

T02D1914:206a-18: thugs rdo rje rjes su gzung ba gsungs pa /
T02D1914:206a-19: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la //
T02D1914:206a-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid la rang rang gi
T02D1914:206a-22: ngo bo nyid du gzhog la tshul bzhin du nyon
T02D1914:206a-23: zhes ba'o // rjes su gzung ba'i dam tshig spyi
T02D1914:206a-24: bos blangs zhes pa ni de bzhin du bgyi zhes
T02D1914:206a-25: zhes ba'o // khas blangs pa'o // cang mi gsung

T02D1914:206a-27: yang dang yang du bshad do //
T02D1914:206a-28: thugs rje chen po ni gzhan gyi don la brtse bar gyur pas de dmigs nas so //
T02D1914:206a-29: byin gyis brlabs zhes pa ni le'u dang po nyid du ste 'dir dran par byas so //
T02D1914:206a-30: gsung gcig tu zhes pa ni tshangs pa'i gsung kho nas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1914:206a-31: de la 'gro ba'i tshul gyis lan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:206a-32: gsang ba zhes byar bstan pa ni //
T02D1914:206a-34: sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni de'i rang bzhin yi ge gsum ho dang bcas pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1914:206a-35: dbyangs kyis bskul ba'i de ma thag 'od kyis sangs
T02D1914:206a-36: rgyas thams cad bsdus pa ni 'dus pa zhes so
T02D1914:206a-37: // rgyud kyi 'brel ba'i lan gsungs pa lnga pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:206a-38: bzhi po de las dam tshig bzhi dang ldan pa'i sngags pa dang /
T02D1914:206a-39: de'i ngo bo'i de kho na nyid dang de'i ngo
T02D1914:206a-40: bo'i srung ba dang bza' ba'i dam tshig go rims
T02D1914:206b-0: de ni @206b sgrub pa chen po zhes ming du
T02D1914:206b-1: btags pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D1914:206b-2: cad kyi sngags dang kun du spyod pa'i dam tshig
T02D1914:206b-3: tu gsungs so // bzhi pa dang ni zhes bya
T02D1914:206b-4: ba la sogs pa bzhis ni gzhan gyi don dang
T02D1914:206b-6: de yang bzhi pa las ni dkyil 'khor zhes ming du btags pa slob ma gzhug pa la /
T02D1914:206b-7: mthar thug pa'i slob dpon gyi las gsungs so //
T02D1914:206b-8: bcu drug pa las dbang gsungs so //
T02D1914:206b-9: brgyad pa las mchod pa'i sdom pa gsungs so //
T02D1914:206b-10: bcu gnyis pa las thun mong gi dngos grub gsungs te /
T02D1914:206b-11: sdom pa dang thun mong gi dngos grub ni rang gi don la yang 'brel te /
T02D1914:206b-12: 'dir le'u bzhir byas pa mdzes pa dang /
T02D1914:206b-13: de yang 'brel ba'i phyir gsungs te /
T02D1914:206b-14: de bzhin du 'og nas 'byung ba'i drug pa dang
T02D1914:206b-15: bdun pa la sogs pa yang rjes su dpag go
T02D1914:206b-16: // brgyad pa dang ni zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1914:206b-17: ni rang gi don gnyis las drag shul gyi sgrub
T02D1914:206b-18: pa gsungs te brgyad pa ni drug pa'o //
T02D1914:206b-19: de las ni rjes su chags pa dang nye bar sgrub pa gsungs pa /
T02D1914:206b-20: gnyis pa las byang chub kyi sems kyi sdom pa
T02D1914:206b-21: gsungs pa bcu pa dang bcu bzhi pa las drag
T02D1914:206b-22: shul gyi cho ga gsungs te /

T02D1914:206b-25: bdun pa dang ni zhes pa la sogs pas rang
T02D1914:206b-26: gi don bsnyen pa'i ngo bo rjes su dran pa
T02D1914:206b-27: la sogs pa'am / kha cig 'dod pa de ltar ma yin pa'i ngo bo gsungs te /
T02D1914:206b-28: bdun pa las sgrub pa'i sdom pa rjes su dran pa gsungs /
T02D1914:206b-29: gsum pa las mchog gi bsnyen par gtogs pa gsungs /
T02D1914:206b-30: gcig las rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa la
T02D1914:206b-31: sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las gsungs
T02D1914:206b-32: / bcu gcig pa las dngos grub kyi zhing ri dang dgon pa la sogs pa gsungs /
T02D1914:206b-33: bco lnga pa las rmi lam gyi mtshan ma gsungs
T02D1914:206b-34: te 'di yang ri dang dgon pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1914:206b-35: bzhi nas mtshan ma byung ba'i par dang /
T02D1914:206b-36: rjes su dran pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad sbyar
T02D1914:206b-37: te 'di rnams te ni le'u'i chos gtsor gzung bar
T02D1914:206b-38: zad do // de ltar le'u'i don gyi 'brel pa
T02D1914:207a-0: rnams gsungs nas gzhan yang lhur 'brel pa rnams @207a
T02D1914:207a-2: dul ba gdul dka' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:207a-3: de la zhi ba'i sems can ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs par 'brel to //
T02D1914:207a-4: gdul dka' ba'i gdug pa can rnams ni drag pos tshar bcad par 'brel to //
T02D1914:207a-5: thun mong dang mchog gi lha bskyed pa la rdo
T02D1914:207a-6: rje bzhi dang cho ga bzhis bsnyen par 'brel to
T02D1914:207a-7: // thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub dang de'i las kyi gzhung 'brel to //
T02D1914:207a-8: dkyil 'khor las dang brtul zhugs so //
T02D1914:207a-9: de lta bu'i gzhung de rnams dang slob dpon no //
T02D1914:207a-10: yang slob dpon dang slob ma ste de lta bu'i
T02D1914:207a-11: dbang bskur ba ni bdag nyid chen po zhes te
T02D1914:207a-12: / de kho na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1914:207a-13: dpa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa nyid kyis yongs su grol
T02D1914:207a-14: / bar 'dod do // sbyor ba'i lan ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
T02D1914:207a-15: de'i ngo bo ni stong pa dang snying rje las
T02D1914:207a-16: byung ba'i mtshan nyid de zab pa dang rgya che
T02D1914:207a-17: ba'o // rgyud kyi 'brel pa zhes pa dang /
T02D1914:207a-18: 'di'i sbyor ba zhes pa'i sgra'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1914:207a-19: rgyud ces bya bar 'brel pa'i don zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:207a-20: de la gzhi ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin te de ni thabs zhes ming du btags so //
T02D1914:207a-21: rang bzhin ni lha rnams sbyor ba ste de yang
T02D1914:207a-22: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes pa rang bzhin med
T02D1914:207a-24: 'du ba med pa ni 'bras bu ste 'du ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bas so //
T02D1914:207a-25: bye brag ces pa ni rgyu 'bras kyi rim pa tha dad pas gsum zhes te /
T02D1914:207a-26: de gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud de le'u dang por gsungs la /
T02D1914:207a-27: rnal 'byor pa'i yang de bzhin zhes pa'i sgras shes par bya'o zhes pa la 'dod do //
T02D1914:207a-28: bdag cag gi bla ma gcig pa kha cig na re /
T02D1914:207a-29: 'dir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i skye ba ni 'brel pa ste /
T02D1914:207a-30: de la rgyu'i rnam pa rdo rje sems dpa' ni gzhi ste de ni thabs so //
T02D1914:207a-31: rang bzhin ni de'i shes rab ste de ni rang bzhin med pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1914:207a-32: 'dir rgyu'i sgra ni dngos po'i sgra'o //
T02D1914:207a-33: 'du ba med pa ni reg pa'i lha ste 'bras
T02D1914:207a-34: bu'i rnam ba kho nas 'du ba med pa zhes
T02D1914:207a-35: so // de dag gi 'dod pa ni gsang ba
T02D1914:207a-36: 'dus pa ni bdag ste rig pa'i lha'i sku gsung
T02D1914:207a-37: thugs kyis 'dus pa'i phung po la sogs pa ji
T02D1914:207a-38: snyed pa gang zag gcig gi rgyud du bsdus pa
T02D1914:207b-1: bdag pha ma las 'byung ba ni de'i rgyud do zhes nges pa'i tshig go //
T02D1914:207b-2: yang gzhan gyi man ngag las gsang ba ni rig
T02D1914:207b-3: pa'i lha'i gsang bas bsdus pa'i phung po la sogs
T02D1914:207b-4: pa'o // 'dus pa'i de'i rig ma dang gnyis su
T02D1914:207b-5: med par spyor ba ste 'dus pa ni tshogs pa'o
T02D1914:207b-6: pa'o // // de yang 'brel pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D1914:207b-7: rig pa'i lha ni gzhi ste thabs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:207b-8: 'du ba med pa ni tshogs pa tha dad pa'o zhes smras te /
T02D1914:207b-9: gang phyir rnam gsum rgyud kyi don du bsdus //
T02D1914:207b-10: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir de dag lar yang mi 'thad do //
T02D1914:207b-11: de bas na dris tshig dang po'i don las byung
T02D1914:207b-12: ba'i gzhi la sogs pa gsum ni rgyud do zhes
T02D1914:207b-13: bya ba ni rig pa ste gzhil sogs pa'i bshad
T02D1914:207b-14: pa ni 'das ma thag pa bzhin no //
T02D1914:207b-15: rgyud kyi dbye ba gsungs pa /
T02D1914:207b-16: rigs ni rnam pa lnga dang zhes so //
T02D1914:207b-17: phyi ma'i don gsungs pa byang chub rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:207b-18: byang chub rdo rjes bcas pa la rigs lnga rnams kyi bshad pa ni phyi ma zhes bya'o //
T02D1914:207b-19: de kho na nyid rnam pa du gsungs zhes pa la sogs pa bzhi la gsungs pa /
T02D1914:207b-20: de kho na nyid rigs lngar gsungs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:207b-21: rigs brgya zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par dbye ba ste /
T02D1914:207b-22: rgyu las ye shes lnga dang 'bras bu bcu dgu la lnga lnga ste brgya'o //
T02D1914:207b-23: gzhan dag gis ni gzhan du bshad de de ni ma yin no //
T02D1914:207b-24: 'di rnams ni lan dang spyar nas gsungs kyi /
T02D1914:207b-25: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ngo bo
T02D1914:207b-26: sa'i snying po dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dpa'
T02D1914:207b-27: bo rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi rig pa
T02D1914:207b-28: ye shes lngar 'dus pa rnams kyi dbye ba mtha'
T02D1914:207b-29: yas so // byang chub sems kyi lan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:207b-30: skye 'gag med pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:207b-31: dngos dang dngos med mi zad ces pa ni de gnyis ka rang bzhin med ce'o //
T02D1914:207b-32: gtso zhes bya ba ni mchog gi sgra'o //
T02D1914:207b-33: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa //
T02D1914:207b-34: zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las byung zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1914:207b-35: de'i rnam pa la chos thams cad 'du ba gsungs pa /
T02D1914:207b-36: srid dang zhi ba 'byung ba kun //
T02D1914:207b-37: zhes te 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1914:207b-38: thams cad rnam pa gcig go zhes pa'i tha tshig
T02D1914:207b-39: go // de'i don ni rtsa ba las kyang /
T02D1914:207b-40: rang gi sems ni brtag pa la //
T02D1914:207b-41: zhes pa la sogs bas gsal bar gsungs so//
T02D1914:208a-0: @208a * // rig pa'i skyes bu'i lan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:208a-1: rang gi lus ngag ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:208a-2: mi phyed pa de gnyis kyi rnam par phyi nas
T02D1914:208a-3: rig pa des na ldan pa de de'i skyes bu
T02D1914:208a-4: zhes so // badzra dhrik la sogs pa lnga'i lan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:208a-5: rgyu lnga dag gi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:208a-6: de la 'og dang steng na lnga lnga gnas pa
T02D1914:208a-7: ni rgyu dang 'bras bu ste ye shes lnga'i rdo
T02D1914:208a-8: rje'o // dhrika ces bya ba ni de gang gi chang pas 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1914:208a-9: rnam shes zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
T02D1914:208a-10: des rnam par dag pa'i rgyu 'bras gnyis gzung ngo //
T02D1914:208a-11: yod med dbus las 'das pa'i ngo bo las /
T02D1914:208a-12: sems can kun gyi 'byung ba dang de las gyur
T02D1914:208a-13: pa'i byung ba nyid kyis skyes pa de rnam par
T02D1914:208a-14: dag pa rgyal bas 'dzin ces so //
T02D1914:208a-15: gzugs zhes pa yang de'i phung po ste nges rnam par dag pa'i snang mdzad do //
T02D1914:208a-16: de'i phyir phyag na 'khor lo thogs ma la sogs pa'i rim pa med pa rnams so //
T02D1914:208a-17: don thams cad 'byung bas na sems la rin chen zhes so //
T02D1914:208a-18: tshor ba zhes pa ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1914:208a-19: tshor ba des sems rang rig cing 'dzin pas na de'i phyag na rin chen bsnams so //
T02D1914:208a-20: thams cad nas zhes pa ni rnam pa'o //
T02D1914:208a-21: thams cad du zhes pa ni dus so //
T02D1914:208a-22: rol ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad mtshon cing zhes pas a'a ro li ka go //
T02D1914:208a-23: 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon zhes pa ni 'du shes te 'di yang sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D1914:208a-24: de'i phyir 'di'i phyag na thams cad shes pa'i ma chags pa'i padma bsnams so //
T02D1914:208a-25: rnam shes zhes pa ni mtshon pa ste gzugs la
T02D1914:208a-26: sogs pa'i phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid gsal bar byed
T02D1914:208a-28: 'du byed ces pa yang phung po ste 'du byed
T02D1914:208a-29: des shes rab 'dzin te de'i gzhi yin pas so
T02D1914:208a-30: // de'i phyir phyag na ral gri 'dzin to //
T02D1914:208a-31: rigs kyi lan gsungs pa rigs ni rgyud ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:208a-32: rigs dang rgyud kyi sgra 'dra'o zhes te /
T02D1914:208a-33: de'i thog ma ni gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
T02D1914:208a-34: des na sgra las kyang thog mar 'dir mtshon par byed pa ae wam zhes so //
T02D1914:208a-35: de ltar yang bzang po zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1914:208a-36: gnyis med thog ma bzhir ldan pa //
T02D1914:208a-37: yi ge gnyis kyi de bzhin mtshon //
T02D1914:208a-39: de'i gco bo skye 'ga' med pa'i stong pa ste
T02D1914:208b-0: stong pa @208b nyid kyi ye shes dag pa'i rgyu
T02D1914:208b-1: 'bras ni rigs lnga'i gtso bo zhes so //
T02D1914:208b-2: gong du gsungs pa'i sku de la ye shes lnga dang sbyor ba gsungs pa /
T02D1914:208b-3: rnam shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:208b-4: de la rnam shes ni gong du bstan pa'i rnam
T02D1914:208b-5: par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pa'i sku'o
T02D1914:208b-6: // de gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang sbyor bas na zhe sdang zhes te /
T02D1914:208b-7: phan tshun thug pa ni zhe sdang zhes 'og nas 'byung ngo //
T02D1914:208b-8: ye shes de ni sku gnyis dang sbyor bas na /
T02D1914:208b-9: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su grags //
T02D1914:208b-11: gzugs zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa bzhin te 'og ma kun la yang sbyar ro //
T02D1914:208b-12: de ni mtshan ma'i rnam par shes pa med pas
T02D1914:208b-13: na glen pa'i me lod lta bu'i ye shes dang
T02D1914:208b-14: sbyar te / des na gti mug ces btags so //
T02D1914:208b-15: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis zhen cing gong rlom pa de ni nga rgyal zhes so //
T02D1914:208b-16: so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid gang gnyis su med
T02D1914:208b-17: pa'i dngos po la chags pas 'dod chags zhes so
T02D1914:208b-18: // bya ba nan tan gyi ngo bo rtag tu
T02D1914:208b-19: sems can gyi don la brtson pa la bdag nyid
T02D1914:208b-20: kho na rol cing gtong bas phrag dog go //
T02D1914:208b-22: 'dong dang grol ba rab sgrub pa'o //
T02D1914:208b-24: 'dod chags zhe sdang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1914:208b-25: 'dir ye shes gsum gsungs pa ni gtso bo ste gnyis kyang sbyar ro //
T02D1914:208b-26: mtshan nyid sna tshogs 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1914:208b-27: ste de ni 'dod pa de la phyogs shing bsgoms
T02D1914:208b-28: pa'i 'bras bu'o // mo ha la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1914:208b-29: de'i dga' ma dang phun sum tshogs pa'i lan gsungs pa /
T02D1914:208b-30: gnyis med chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o//
T02D1914:208b-31: phyi rol zhes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
T02D1914:208b-32: nga rgyal zhes pa ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa mi
T02D1914:208b-33: shes pa ste de ni me long lta bu gong
T02D1914:208b-34: du gti mug tu bstan to //
T02D1914:208b-35: phan tshun thug pa ni gnyis su med ces gong du bstan zin to //
T02D1914:208b-36: 'dis kyang ye shes kyang gnyis su med pa yod pa de ni zhe sdang ngo zhes bstan to //
T02D1914:208b-37: 'dod chags kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1914:208b-38: ye shes 'di zhes bya ba ni dbyer med pas rdo rje'o //
T02D1914:208b-39: gtso bo rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyi dga' ba
T02D1914:208b-40: ni lha mo bzhi'i reg pa'i longs spyod las byung
T02D1914:208b-41: ba de rnams ni dga' ma zhes so //
T02D1914:208b-42: bud med de rnams kho na las dga' ba'i rim
T02D1914:208b-43: pas yang dag pa'i bde ba ye shes kyi rang
T02D1914:209a-0: @209a * // bzhin pas mchog phun sum tshogs pa de 'byung bas na phun sum tshogs zhes so //
T02D1914:209a-1: de ni zhes pa de dga' ba nyid do //
T02D1914:209a-2: de'i rim pas bde ba'i ye shes sangs rgyas thob
T02D1914:209a-3: pas na nyon mongs pa'i dga' ba nyid rdo rje
T02D1914:209a-4: theg pa'o // kha cig gis de ni zhes pa

T02D1914:209a-6: theg pa'o // // de bzhi ni shes rab yin
T02D1914:209a-7: pas thabs zhes bya ba'i sgra dang mi 'byor ba
T02D1914:209a-8: theg pa'o // // dang / de ltar na thabs
T02D1914:209a-9: kyang rdo rje theg par 'gyur ba las ma bzung
T02D1914:209a-10: theg pa'o // // dang / bas so // ya
T02D1914:209a-11: m'a nta kri ta la sogs pa bzhi'i lan gsungs
T02D1914:209a-12: theg pa'o // // dang / bas so // pa
T02D1914:209a-13: / rnam par mi 'jog ces pa la sogs pa'o
T02D1914:209a-14: theg pa'o // // dang / bas so // pa
T02D1914:209a-15: / // bzhi po 'di'i sgra ni phrin las kyi
T02D1914:209a-17: de la ya m'a nta kri ta kyis spyan drangs
T02D1914:209a-18: pa'i skus 'dul ba'i zhing rnams la skye ba med
T02D1914:209a-19: pa'i phyir 'jig pa dang bral ba'i chos bstan pa
T02D1914:209a-21: de ni dngos po kun zhes pa me long lta bu dang /
T02D1914:209a-22: snying rje dang sbyin pa la sogs pa mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig go //
T02D1914:209a-23: de nas gshin rje gshed mthar byed de zhes pa
T02D1914:209a-24: ni phrin las des 'og nas byung bas mi rig
T02D1914:209a-25: pa la sogs pa mthar byed pas so //
T02D1914:209a-26: 'dir bshad pa 'di ni kun la sbyar ro //
T02D1914:209a-27: rnam par mi shes zhes pa ni aa la sogs
T02D1914:209a-28: pa'i yi ge med pa'i phyir 'dzin pa'i shes pa
T02D1914:209a-30: sems zhes pa stong pa nyid dang byams pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:209a-31: ming dang gzugs kyi blo ni brjod pa'i rgyu ste de med pas brjod du med ces pa'o //
T02D1914:209a-32: chos rnams ni so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:209a-33: gzugs la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis zhi bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos bstan pa'o //
T02D1914:209a-34: shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur //
T02D1914:209a-35: zhes pa ni de ltar bstan pa'i 'dul ba'i zhing dag gis so //
T02D1914:209a-36: da ni sgra 'jug pa'i don gsungs pa gti mug ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:209a-37: dag pa'i gti mug longs spyod pa'i gti mug chen
T02D1914:209a-38: po me long lta bu de'i dam tshig phyin ci
T02D1914:209a-39: log gi gti mug gong du bstan pa'i khro bo'i
T02D1914:209a-40: las kyis zad par byed do //
T02D1914:209a-41: gzugs rnams zhes pa ni de'i 'jig tshogs la lta bslangs pa'o //
T02D1914:209a-42: shes bya zhes pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'o //
T02D1914:209a-44: sems shes pa ni mthar 'dzin par lta ba'o //
T02D1914:209a-45: tshig ces pa ni log par lta ba ste lta
T02D1914:209b-0: ba gsum la lus ngag yid gsum gyi @209b ming
T02D1914:209b-1: du bstan pa ni de'i rigs kyi phyir ro //
T02D1914:209b-2: snyoms 'jug ces pa ni skye ba'i sgrib pa'o //
T02D1914:209b-3: nyon mongs kun zhes pa ni gti mug la sogs pa gsum mo //
T02D1914:209b-4: rdo rje kun zhes pa ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1914:209b-5: lta ba gong ma kun la 'dzin pas so //
T02D1914:209b-6: sgrib pa kun zhes pa ni las kyi sgrib pa ste thams cad kyi las yin pas so //
T02D1914:209b-7: gong du shes pa ni bde ba thob par 'gyur zhes pa de bshad pa /
T02D1914:209b-8: sems can nyon mongs rdo rje sgrib //
T02D1914:209b-9: ces te sngon lta bu'i chos bstan pas gnas la
T02D1914:209b-10: zhen pa'i sems kyi nyon mongs pa dang rdo rje'i
T02D1914:209b-11: sgrib pa dag ni shas bzhi zhes pa'o //
T02D1914:209b-12: de dang ldan na ma lus pa la sogs pa'i las dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1914:209b-13: de dag ni de'i 'bras bu bde ba'o //
T02D1914:209b-14: de dag gi don yang bzang po zhabs kyis gsungs pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D1914:209b-15: dris pa med na yang khro bo drug la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1914:209b-16: gzung ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1914:209b-17: de la gzung ba ni byang chub kyi don 'dzin pa'o //

T02D1914:209b-20: mi g-yo ba ni de la sems brtan pa'o //
T02D1914:209b-21: rgyu ni de nyid rgyu'i ngo bo'o //

T02D1914:209b-23: thugs las yang dag byung zhes pa ni de dag
T02D1914:209b-24: ni gong du yang ri mo bri ba ma yin
T02D1914:209b-25: gyi yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ngo
T02D1914:209b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D1914:209b-29: zhes pa ni spyi'i sngags yi ge gsum mo //
T02D1914:209b-30: bdag nyid chen po zhes pa ni ye shes las
T02D1914:209b-31: grub pa'i bdag nyid can gyi lha mo drug ste
